screen_desc: The screenshot shows the search results for the "Lyft" app in the Google Play Store or a similar app marketplace. The app's logo is visible, featuring a pink icon with the Lyft branding. The app title and description ("Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit") are also displayed at the top. The interface is clean and minimalistic, with a search bar at the top for further navigation.
history_actions: click on the "Play Store" icon located at the right and lower part of the screen.
click on the magnifying glass search icon located at the top-right corner.
click on the search bar located at the top right.
type in the content: "Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit"

think_action.Thought: The user is on the screen displaying the search results for the 'Lyft' app, which is visible in the search results. The next step is to find the app and uninstall it from the device. The action to uninstall is typically achieved by selecting the app and then tapping the 'Uninstall' button, which should be visible once the app is selected.
